resources.string: To play Tic Tac Toe you will need a 3x3 board as seen in the photo. The aim of the game is to mark spaces on the board alternately until one of the players gets 3 in a row. The line can be horizontal, diagonal or vertical.
One player will use the X symbol and the other will use O. For example, the first player (X) will start playing and will mark his/her symbol on one of the boxes.
Once a player have three in a row, or Tic Tac Toe! Player has won the game.
This app is developed in completion as a requirement for the subject further Programming and Problem Solving (CO5025)
App developed by: Wan Nor Amirah Bte Hj Wan Mohd Asri (1430692)
